string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: You can toggle between showing posted and unposted transactions in the search menu.
You can change the order of columns for importing and exporting CSV items through the settings.
You can change the preferred date format for importing and exporting through the settings.
Loot Premium allows you to chart details for all your accounts.
Changing color schemes allows you to easily differentiate between different transaction types.
You can view repeating transactions through the repeat manager menu option, and edit them with Loot Premium.
Loot Premium widgets allow you to see your account balance from your home screen, and start directly in that account.
Marking an account as primary will allow you to start in that transaction without seeing the accounts screen.
When two or more accounts are present, you are given an option to transfer between accounts.
You can search for transactions based on the party name or the tags.
Don\'t like the color choices? Set them to whatever you want with Loot Premium!
You can purge posted transactions when you think you have too many listed.
You can restore transactions that were previously purged (but not deleted). The restore date works backwards from today, the opposite way that the purge date works.
Have any tips you want to share? Send them to me and I\'ll try to include them in future releases!
Don\'t want other people to see your account details? Enable the security option, and always use the back key to exit.
Long-click on a transaction to bring up the context menu, which which allows you to edit or delete transactions, and more.
Use the repeat once option from the context menu to do an immediate, one-time repetition of a transaction.

To enter a negative amount, start an account with a zero balance, then enter a dummy transaction to put your account in the negative. After that, if you don\'t want to see that transaction, click the check for it and purge the posted transactions.
Automatic backups will run 5 minutes after your most recent change when the option is enabled.

string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item:
• Merged base and Premium into a single version
 • Added action bars to account and transaction list screens
 • Added feature to jump to transactions when added
 • Improved aesthetics of the changelog
 • Improved usability selecting transactions on non-touchscreen devices
 • Fixed bug which caused crash on launch when automatic purging was turned on when no accounts are present
 • Added option for credit accounts
 • Added option to display different balance on account summary screen
 • Added additional sidebar coloring option
 • Added option to remove transaction type prefixes
 • Fixed a bug which caused crashing when charting based on words with apostrophes in them
 • Added an option to automatically insert decimals in currency text edits
 • Fixed a bug which prevented importing certain transactions

• Fixed layout issue for Simply Stunning ROM
 • Fixed force close bug when opening an account
 • Fixed SD card space availability calculation (Premium)

• Fixed bug calculating running balance while sorting from top
 • Added optional confirmation when restoring the database
 • Added option to only search loot directory on external storage when scanning for files to import (Premium)

• Made the option to show colors on by default
 • Added option to sort transactions with most recent on top
 • Fixed bug which caused force closing when calculating running balances
 • Added option to show no balance on widgets (Premium)

• Fixed bug which caused force closing when calculating running balances
 • Fixed bug which caused force closing when searching for importable files (Premium)

• Removed donation reminder
 • Fixed bi-weekly scheduling bug
 • Adjusted transaction layout better for landscape orientation
 • Added option for running balance
 • Fixed bug which caused transaction editing to crash
 • Fixed bugs related to adding widgets (Premium)
 • Added automatic backup option (Premium)
 • Fixed bugs related to attaching receipt images (Premium)
 • Fixed screen size usage when charting (Premium)
 • Added option to chart based on account balance (Premium)
 • Fixed some charting crashes and issues (Premium)
 • Fixed custom color picker to work better on WVGA screens (Premium)
\n • Fixed database backup and file export issues\n

• Fixed issue with reloading primary account/exiting application when rotating screen
 • Improved account screen loading speed
 • Added option to display different balances in widget (Premium)
 • Added check option to transfers
 • Added smaller widget (Premium)

• Fixed issue with primary accounts not working properly
 • Fixed date formatting issues with QIF imports (Premium)
 • Fixed widget currency symbol detection (Premium)
 • Fixed crash when dragging over single receipt image (Premium)

• Added option for a primary account which bypasses the account screen
 • Changed order of items for account context menus
 • Fixed a bug regarding searching transactions based on tag
 • Added option to change on-screen keyboard input type
 • Fixed issue with incorrectly reporting the space available on SD cards > 4GB in size
 • Added a menu option to delete repeating transactions (Premium version allows editing)
 • Changed the application icon (thanks, Jay!)
 • Added options in search menu for hiding transactions based on posted status
 • Enabled fast-scrolling on the transaction list
 • Added widgets to display account information and provide quick access to accounts (Premium)
 • Added ability to attach images/receipts to transactions (Premium)
 • Improved flexibility of CSV importing and exporting (Premium)
 • Added tips to help users

• Improved display for devices with larger/denser screens
 • Fixed currency entry issues with 3-row physical keyboards

• Fixed currency entry issues with CLIQ and Moment physical keyboards
 • Improved transaction list screen
 • Added support for more QIF import cases (Premium)

• Improved currency entry method
 • Fixed an error with restoring databases
 • Improved Quicken import methods (Premium)
 • Fixed a bug that caused a crash when no file to import was selected (Premium)

• Fixed issue with account balances not updating after initial balance was changed
 • Improved monetary entry methods, fixed locale detection parts
 • Fixed premium activities to allow for widescreen view (Premium)
\n • Returning from import now shows imported transactions properly (Premium)

• Fixed force-close on return from entering transaction
 • Improved Quicken import and export methods (Premium)
 • Added messages when no or low external storage is available
 • Added message to tell user how many rows were imported (Premium)
 • Fixed date entries when going back and creating another chart (Premium)
\n • Fixed total balance calculation\n • Fixed force-close on open

• Added import and export of CSV and Quicken files (Premium)
 • Added custom colors for transactions (Premium)
 • Added charting across multiple accounts (Premium)
 • Added support for large fonts
 • Added new color schemes
 • Added option to color backgrounds instead of text
 • Added option to color negative balances in red
 • Added option to display total balance
\n • Fixed database backup issue where the parent directory wasn’t being created

• Removed app-based update checking
 • Fixed bug in database backup which destroyed repeat schedules
 • Improved database backup procedure
 • Added on-demand repeat feature as a context menu item for transactions
 • Added shortcut keys for transaction menu
\n • Fixed bug regarding scheduling repeating transactions.\n • Fixed bug regarding PIN screen being bypassed when launched from the recent applications menu.
